[[Image:Michael Martinez.jpg: '''Michael Martinez''' (born [[1959]]) is one of the most well known [[Tolkienist
thumb: scholars]] in regards to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s works. He first published ''[[Parma Endorion]]'' in [[1996]] and has published a vast array of essays over the years. Most of these can be read online via his [http://www.merp.com/essays/michael-martinez-1 section on MERP.com].
